ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##为了避免转马丢失内容.*|\s*本章没完，请点击下—页继续阅读.*\s*|敬请您来体验无广告.*|爱读免费小说.*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/premier/)){
	result=java.getString(".read-content@html")
	}else{
		toc=java.getElements('.chaw_c li a')
		urls=[]
		toc.forEach(c=>{
			url="https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+String(c.attr("href"))
			if(!urls.includes(url)){
				urls.push(url)
				}
			})
		results=java.ajaxAll(urls)
		txt=""
		results.forEach(r=>{
			r=r.body()
			txt+=java.getString(".read-content@html",r)
			})
			result=txt
		}
result
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(page!="1"){
	java.toast(`当前第${page}页`)
	}
result
</js>
#nr
ruleSearch.name: h3@a@text##《|》.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
-<js>
result=java.getElements(`#nr:has(h3 a:matches(${book.name}))`)
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(result.length==1&&page=="1"){
	uri=result[0].select("h3 a").attr("href")
	toc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax("https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+uri))
	result=toc.select(".chaw_c li")
	result.sort((a,b)=>String(b).localeCompare(String(a)))
	java.log(result)
	}
result
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.请使用3.25发布版阅读app
2.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
3.需要登录，各个域名登录状态相互独立
4.可在登录ui界面查看当前使用域名与登录状态，可切换域名、测试延迟
5.请不要更改源域名，会使已缓存小说丢失
6.可通过登录UI验证
7.防倒卖，请在登录UI界面输入作者名：tlyanyu

loginUi:
[
  { name: "源作者：", type: "text" },
  { name: "查看当前", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "恢复默认", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "查看网页", type: "button", action: "startbrowser()" },
  { name: "----------切换源站&连接测试----------", type: "button" },
  { name: "①uaa001", type: "button", action: "$(1)"},
  { name: "②uaa002", type: "button", action: "$(2)"},
  { name: "③uaa003", type: "button", action: "$(3)"},
  { name: "④uaa004", type: "button", action: "$(4)"},
  { name: "⑤uaa005", type: "button", action: "$(5)"},
  { name: "⑥202410", type: "button", action: "$(6)"},
  {name: "邮箱", type: "text"},
  {name: "密码", type: "password"},
  {name: "登录", type: "button", action: "loginButton()"},
  {name: "退出", type: "button", action: "logOut()"},
  {name: "验证码",type: "button", action: "sendCF()"}
]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if( String(chapter.baseUrl).indexOf(Get("url")) !== -1 ){
var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let catalog = document.select("ul.catalog_ul");
let atag = catalog.select("a");
let url0 = Get('url') + atag.attr("href");
let html0 = java.ajax(url0);
let document0 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html0);
document0.select("li.child, li.menu, div.volume_title_box");
</js>
